description: Details required by condition 3g (submission of details) of listed building consent 23/06242 (Demolition and erection of new rear infill basement/ground floor extension; Alterations to rear windows at ground and first floor levels; re-instatement of original basement window opening and installation of window to front elevation; replacement sash windows throughout apart from original window on ground floor front elevation, skylight, roof hatch and solar panels within butterfly roof; installation of air source heat pump within lower ground floor vaults; raise rear garden level to allow for water attenuation tanks and create level access from inside; internal alterations at basement, ground and second floors)
